#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long int

int main()
{
    int t,l;
    cin>>t;
    for(l=1;l<=t;l++)
    {
        ll i,j,cnt,x,cry,flag;
        vector<int> a,b;
        string y;
        cin>>x>>y;
        for(i=0;i<y.size();i++) {b.push_back(y[i]-'0');}
        a.push_back(1);
        cnt=0;
        while(a.size()<b.size())
        {
            cry=0;
            for(i=0;i<a.size();i++)
            {
               cry=a[i]*x+cry;
               a[i]=cry%10;
               cry/=10;
            }
            while(cry)
            {
                a.push_back(cry%10);
                cry/=10;
            }
            cnt++;
        }
        while(1)
        {
           flag=0;
           for(i=0,j=a.size()-1;i<b.size();i++,j--)
           {
              if(a[j]==b[i]) continue;
              else {flag=1; break;}
           }
           if(flag)
           {
               cry=0;
               for(i=0;i<a.size();i++)
               {
                  cry=a[i]*x+cry;
                  a[i]=cry%10;
                  cry/=10;
               }
               while(cry)
               {
                  a.push_back(cry%10);
                  cry/=10;
               }
               cnt++;
           }
           else
           {
              j=cnt;
              while(j)
              {
                  if(j%10==0) j/=10;
                  else {flag=1; break;}
              }
              if(flag) break;
              else continue;
           }
        }
        cout<<"Case "<<l<<": "<<cnt<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
